title: 99x8: Recusal Obligation and Screening Arrangements
summary:
OGE discusses the obligation to recuse under 18 U.S.C. § 208 or 5 C.F.R. § 2635.502, and, suggests screening arrangements and other procedures that may be used to help ensure that a commitment to recuse is carried out effectively, and encloses a model recusal memorandum.  

Notes: [Notes: (1) The guidance in this advisory was updated in 2014 by Legal Advisory LA-14-06. (2) Changes to the Standards of Conduct effective August 15, 2024 have modified a certain element of the discussion in this advisory relating to the 2635.502 “catch-all” provision.]
